org.jpac.plc

Class RxTx

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jpac.plc.RxTx
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BitRxTx, ByteRxTx, DintRxTx, DwordRxTx, IntRxTx, WordRxTx

    public abstract class RxTx
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to transfer data between the java application and the plc. Can be used standalone or in the context of a complex data structure (STRUCT)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Address getAddress() 
      protected Connection getConnection() 
      protected Data getData() 
      ReadRequest getReadRequest()
      returns the ReadRequest, used to read the data item from the plc
      protected ReceiveTransaction getRxTrans() 
      static int getSize() 
      protected TransmitTransaction getTxTrans() 
      WriteRequest getWriteRequest()
      returns the WriteRequest, used to writeInt the data item to the plc
      RxTx read()
      used to read the data item from plc and store it inside data.
      void write()
      used to writeInt the represented data item to the plc.
      void writeDeferred()
      adds this rxtx to the data items to be written to the plc on next getTxTrans().transact() operation multiple writeDeferred() calls for different parts of a complex data item may be issued before transacting them collectively CAUTION: the transaction buffer must be cleared before the first writeDeferred() call.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • RxTx

        public RxTx(Connection conn,
            Address address,
            int dataOffset,
            Data data)
     throws IndexOutOfRangeException
        Parameters:
        conn - an open TCP/IP connection to the plc
        address - address of the data item exchanged with the plc
        dataOffset - the byte offset inside data, holding the data item to be exchanged with the plc
        data - instance of Data used to hold the data item exchanged with the plc.
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfRangeException

    • Method Detail

      • getSize

        public static int getSize()

      • write

        public void write()
           throws java.io.IOException
        used to writeInt the represented data item to the plc. Only the portion of data occupied by the data item is written.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • read

        public RxTx read()
          throws java.io.IOException
        used to read the data item from plc and store it inside data.
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • writeDeferred

        public void writeDeferred()
                   throws java.io.IOException
        adds this rxtx to the data items to be written to the plc on next getTxTrans().transact() operation multiple writeDeferred() calls for different parts of a complex data item may be issued before transacting them collectively CAUTION: the transaction buffer must be cleared before the first writeDeferred() call. somedata.getTxTrans().removeAllRequests(); ... somedata.something.set(...); somedata.something.writeDeferred(); ... somedata.somethingelse.set(...); somedata.somethingelse.writeDeferred(); ... somedata.getTxTrans().transact();
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
